actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts received under certain tuition-remission programs of institutions of higher education will be treated as scholarships.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received under tuition-remission programs at institutions of higher education.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts received under certain tuition-remission programs of institutions of higher education will be treated as scholarships.
